description: Gets the Single-Sign-On token for the API Management Service which is valid for 5 Minutes.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

redirecturi.description: Redirect URL to the Publisher Portal containing the SSO token.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

service_name.description: The name of the API Management service.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
